萰萰萰

萰字的基本解释

萰
liàn
白蔹，根呈卵形块状，数个相聚。

萰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàn］
［《廣韻》郎甸切，去霰，來。］
义未详。

萰字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萰； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1042第40
【唐韻】郞甸切，音練。草名。【玉篇】白蘞也。【爾雅·釋草】萰，菟荄。　又芊萰，靑盛貌。【郭璞·江賦】涯灌芊萰。

萰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
萰字的起名意思

暂无。

萰
Basic explanation of words
萰
liàn
White cypress, the roots are ovoid-shaped, and several are gathered together.
萰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàn］
["Guangyun" Lang Dian cut, go to ha, come. ]
The meaning is unclear.
萰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　萰; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1042 No. 40
[Tang Yun] Yin Dian cut, tone practice. Cursive name. [Jade articles] Bai Su also. 【Erya·Shucao】萰, dodder.　 and Qianqian, great looks. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】The end of the line is filled with rich flowers.
萰
